information: The POITTEMILL group brigs together Broyeurs POITTEMILL Ingénierie and FORPLEX industries which have been designing crushing and industrial classification solutions for over 80 years. The POITTEMILL Group is turned towards innovation and has constantly developed its fine crushing and dry classification techniques, combining related functions, such as drying, cooling, mixing, coating, inerting, ... etc. and has become of the market's leaders.
